description: Did the love of your life tell you that it is all over? Do you want, more than anything, to get back with her or him?  Do you find yourself unable to get over the heartbreak of the breakup and move on?  Are you tired of people telling you to forget him or her and move on with your life? There have been songs, poetry, books and films about heartbreak written throughout the ages. Most adults know the pain of breaking up and how helpless it feels when someone you love says that they do not want to see you anymore. You would do anything to get them back, yet everyone just tells you to "get over it." If you "just can't" then you need the How to Get Your Ex-Lover Back ebook! Boyfriend, girlfriend, wife, husband, it doesn’t matter; stop wishing for a change in the relationship and start making one. Download your guide to a happier tomorrow, today!
